$Henderson was running on pitch when Murphy hit apparent book rule double; Henderson slid into 2nd then started back to 1st when he saw the fly; when ball bounced over fence, umpires waved Henderson to 3rd and he cut across field without touching 2nd again. Orioles appealed and he was called out; Murphy ends on 2nd but play was scored as force on Henderson
Rickey Henderson's SB 92

ej,weave801,M,kaisk901,Arguing trip to mound $Orioles manager Weaver ejected by HP umpire Kaiser when Kaiser charged Orioles with trip to mound; Weaver came to plate as inning was beginning to talk with Kaiser, who walked past him to get a towel to wipe his face; Weaver stayed at plate to talk with catcher and when Kaiser returned, he charged Orioles with a mound visit; Weaver complained strongly and was ejected
Umpire George Maloney was ill and missed the game
